### Q2 
```{r}
Q2 <- grade |> summarize("minimum" = min(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), "maxixmum" = max(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), "median" = median(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), "mean" = mean(Exam, na.rm=TRUE))

table2 <- knitr::kable(Q2)
```
